channel.title: Syi computer beeps WHAT!?!
channel.description:
Ok so i got syied by one of those invalid charectors ones where its like Syipkpker○
like that? or syipkpkerÆ or... SyiPkPkerÄ
get it?
then it started connecting and my computer beeped not from the speakers but from the COMPUTER itself so i shut off server iped them they were still connecting but no beeping and it wouldnt let them in
any ideas why it beeped?

item.title: Syi computer beeps WHAT!?!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

THIS HAPPENED TO ME WHEN I GOT SYI’D BY MIKE (owner of ploxagescape)
his syi’er is weird it makes weird things like
syipkpker:)
syipkpker*
all these weird things…

but main reason why im replying is this…
my comp also beeps when i hit all 4 arrow keys at same time…
for example, im playing StepMania (Ddr) and it tells me to hit all 4 of the arrows at same time
i hit all 4, my computer beeps and i miss the step…

wat causes that?

Read full topic

item.title: Syi computer beeps WHAT!?!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

fallen_angel666:

My guess is its an syi that can crash your computer… if i’m right, then thank god you closed the connection…

Wrong.

You are printing out the characters they send on the command line right? Well there are characters that cause your internal PC speaker to beep. Not a big deal, if you want to stop it only allow characters you want to be printed to the command line.

Read full topic
